title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 October 2015 - XWiki
content:

06:09 <johndoe\_\_> hi how can i know if a xwiki session is still valid or not  
06:11 <johndoe\_\_> i am using appservertrustedauthimpl and want to avoid showing xwiki login page all together.  
06:12 <johndoe\_\_> please help me :)

09:26 <tmortagne> so almost ready for the release, just one thing remaining but need mflorea  
09:29 <gdelhumeau> I've to commit something about https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/253ef43c1c2e94d92a32358bd3f782e3e12c6188#commitcomment-14015386  
09:30 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: ok  
09:32 <msmeria> has quit  
09:33 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <tmortagne> anyone remember if http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/lastBuild/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-test-tests/testReport/org.xwiki.wysiwyg.test.ui/EditWYSIWYGTest/testUndoRepeatedPaste/ is a flickering, it's age 4 now...  
09:36 <tmortagne> we need to list known flickering somewhere  
09:37 <tmortagne> like jira issue with a "flickering" label maybe since after all we need to fix them  
09:38 <tmortagne> starting that the those I know  
09:38 <tmortagne> s/the those/those/  
09:42 <Ramona3> has joined #xwiki  
09:46 <sorinello> has quit  
09:46 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <tmortagne> example http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12739  
09:48 <tmortagne> creating a filter and putting a link in the install plan  
09:48 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <Trefex1> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, thanks for the help the other day it seems we don't have any random tomcat stopping until now ;)  
09:52 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: ok cool  
09:54 <Trefex> has quit  
09:55 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, I have an usage question this time : I would need to set per-wiki section.edit and section.depth parameters, is it possible and how ?  
09:56 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: as far as I can see in the code it's checked only in xwiki.cfg  
09:57 <martinus\_\_> too bad :(  
09:57 <martinus\_\_> thanks.  
09:57 <tmortagne> not really sure why, I don't see any security issue with that, I guess you could create an improvement issue about that since it's quite easy to check in XWikiPreferences and fallback on xwiki.cfg  
09:57 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, I will.  
10:05 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
10:06 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki

10:08 <Pbas> hi everyone: survey done! :-) I forgot to add improvement: make multilingual the blog application . Thxs

10:39 <tmortagne> hold your commits, starting the release on master

10:52 <tmortagne> looks like the script to put back the SNAPSHOT version in the parent is not working that well  
11:04 <flashdel> has joined #xwiki  
11:06 <flashdel> hi folks, i got a question: If i share a site, i get an email where the url is http://localhost:8080/... and not http://my-domain/... Where do i configure that?  
11:11 <martinus\_\_> flashdel, it might me the xwiki.home setting in xwiki.cfg  
11:11 <martinus\_\_> s/me/be  
11:13 <tmortagne> before xwiki.home setting it's usually an issue with the wiki descriptor  
11:13 <tmortagne> go in the wiki index and search for your wiki descriptor and put the right domain in there  
11:20 <vmassol> has quit  
11:26 <tmortagne> [ANN] git/maven release done

14:31 <DarkKnightCZ> sdumitriu1: Hi, do you by any chance remember any blocker why autosave.js isn't enabled for wysiwyg editor? I've tested it by loading the js&css and it works as it should (if i don't count the feature it saves every time, not only when something is modified), it would effectively solve XWIKI-8614
